reviews.review: amazing game when you play with friends!

Its not as good anymore, when it released it wasnt balanced but too many changes has made it almost impossible to play. It doesnt feel like the normal dead by daylight game. It feels like a cheap knockoff that helps killers tremendously. If you dont agree and still think killer is difficult you have no idea how hard it was in 2016-2017. Its so stupidly "balanced" removing half the pallets in the game half the windows is not balanced. There is almost no where to run now and it feels like an F13 game. The reason dead by daylight intrigued me and im sure many others was, it took skill to actually be good at the game and it wasnt like any survivor v killer game allowing the survivors to actually destroy the killer if they arent too good. Which is how it should be if you dont belong in red ranks you'll know it. Now days any killer can get to rank 1 and its almost too easy. Its a terribly balanced game now and is seriously a joke.

Perfavore rimettete l'immortalità dei survivor quando si buttano giù i pallet e si scavalcano le finestre.
Comunque volevo anche dire una cosa...Sto gioco mi girava sempre a 50-60 fps...da un momento all'altro un giorno ci ho voluto giocare e mi ha crashato sempre, da quel giorno non ci posso più giocare non so il perché.
Il gameplay è basato pure quasi tutto sul killer, ormai non ci sono quasi più partite dove il killer perde.
Nerfatelo perché questo gioco da quando lo amavo ora lo odio.
E poi se volete comprarlo non compratelo su Steam a 20€...compratelo su instant gaming che vi da la ky a 8€

知らない誰かと"鬼ごっこ"をするゲーム

ホラーゲームというジャンルですが慣れてしまえば雰囲気や鬼より人間が一番怖いです
ランク上位だった人がわざとランクを下げて初心者キラーを煽ってきたり、４人そろわないとできないゲームなのに平気で切断したり・・・（毎回そういう人がいるわけじゃないけど多いのも事実）

一日のプレイ時間が５，６時間、他のゲームをほとんどしない、毎日ゲーセンで格ゲーや音ゲーを極めてたって人にはおすすめできるゲームです
たまーにちょくちょくやる人にとってはマッチングで待たされるのが苦痛かもしれません

当然上手い人はストレスフリーかもしれませんが上手くなるまでの道のりが長いです
・勝敗を決めるパークが揃うまでBPがかなり必要
・サバイバー側は急速旋回というテクニックがあるが、それを知らないキラーにとってはチート
・長くプレイすれば覚えられるがマップごとの逃げ方やパークの効果、キラーの対処など覚えることが多すぎる
これらはアップデートがあったとしても変わりません
良く言えば鬼と生存者の２種類の遊び方ができて難易度が高く長く遊べるゲームで１日やってもすぐに飽きるということはない

鬼は生存者の動きを予測して詰め将棋のように追い詰めなきゃならないし、生存者は状況判断が重要で鬼の動きに注意しつつ連携しなければならない

ただ僕みたいに軽い気持ちでたまに遊びたいって人にはストレス耐性を試すゲームです
細かいバグなんか気にする人は向いてません
知識と経験を積み重ねることで生存率や全滅率が上がり納得できる試合ができるようになると思います
キラーでVCPTに煽られたりランク19の血塗れ生存者等にぼろぼろにされてへこんだりもしますが、これはそういうゲームです
くやしい思いをするから全滅したときの達成感が半端ないわけです

Lustiges Spiel, was einem zwischendurch aber auch gerne mal die Nerven rauben will. 
Es macht viel Spaß, da jede Menge Abwechslung dabei ist, seien es neue Maps, neue Killer oder Überlebende. 
Durch die vielen Outfits die es mittlerweile gibt, können alle Spieler ihre Figuren individuell anpassen. 
Ich mag das Spiel wirklich gern und spiele es gern mit Freunden zusammen, aber auch allein mit zufälligen Online Spielern, macht es viel Spaß!

キラー側でプレイしました。
  キラーが一方的に殴れるゲーム、かと思いきや板当て等でサバイバーも攻撃してきます。
  全滅させた時の快感はひとしおで、強くなるためにパークを集めたくなります。
  まともな試合をするためにはそれなりのパークが必須となり、パークを取るための必要経験値はとても多く、有用なパークを集めるためにはかなり時間がかかります。
  サバイバーからの煽り、嫌がらせ行為が頻繁にあり、ストレスと嫌気をかかえゲームを去ることになりました。
  このゲームのおかげで、人と対戦するゲームをめっきりやらなくなりました。
quite noice

Desde asesinos que no aguantan un poco de evasion por parte de los survivors y terminan quiteando, hasta compañeros de equipo que te ven a lo lejos mientras huyes y ni tocan los generadores, Dead by daylight lo tiene todo y por todo me refiero a todo, desde lo toxico a lo sano.
Lo bueno:
-Variedad de mapas tanto ventajosas para asesinos / survivors.
-Variedad de habilidades para ambos bandos.
-Progresion por temporadas para mantenerte enganchado.

Lo Meh:
-Gente al azar, sin factor de confianza (Ej: una valoracion post partida que te permita ser emparejado con gente igual).
-Conexion preferentemente mala debido a que el host es uno mismo de asesino.

 Lo malo:
-Salty players.
-Si no juegas con amigos mejor ni juegues.
Calificacion personal: 5.5/10 a pesar de tener muchas cosas destacables prefiero no ponerlas porque se contrarestan con otras so.. "I think we did a pretty good job so far"

Pros:
-Plays well
-Fun with friends
-Many diverse playstyles and tactics
-Many maps
-Many killers
-Lots of characters
-TONS of customization and loadouts
Cons:
-Hard to pick up
-Killer oriented (very easy for killer to win)
-Some DLC characters are very powerful (However not unbeatable in the slightest)
-Once your found your usually out (In high tier play)
Conclusion
 Very fun to play, by far a good play and worth the money. Don't  be discouraged because you will lose, a LOT. Stick with it, it only gets more fun to play the better you get.

Хороший баланс, дружелюбное комьюнити, идеальная система подбора, отличная оптимизация и ещё много других вещей которых нету в этой игре, если коротко все хуевое что было с релиза осталось по сей день, разработчики пинают хуи и клепают скины и им заебись , куча багов , комьюнити хуже только в доте, если искал хоррор с атмосферой забудь это не про дбд , плюсы: весело играть с друзьями (если у тебя их нет забудь про эту игру), может утянуть на долгие сотни часов

Apesar de divertido, o jogo é extremamente bugado e jogar ele solo é pura chatice.

С одной стороны игра притягивает к себе интересным сетингом и геймплеем. С другой мы имеем баги и в значительной степени токсичную аудиторию, если вы играли в доту, то несомненно знакомы с такими людьми.
     Баги сдесь очень интересные и что поразительно - у каждого они свои, у меня например почему-то часть клавиатуры перестаёт нормально работать (такое происходит только в этой игре), а иногда просто выкидывает из матча (с причиной разрыва связи с хостом, якобы хост ливнул все сбежали, но на самом деле игра продолжается без меня),  у моего друга иногда вылетает из игры из-за того,  что, то ли античит, то ли дбд не ладят с драйвером от наушников. Но я более склоняюсь, что это единичные случаи. В самой игре куда больше багов и траблов, так же имеется не очень хорошая оптимизация.
     Поговорим теперь о хорошем. Хоть игра и стагнирует немножко, новые главы добавляют стабильно, но не часто. Интересно играть как за вышивших так и за убийц. И за тех и за тех вы будете испытывать регулярную жопную боль и радость за удачные игры. Всё зависит как от других игроков, так и от вас самих.
Не смотря на все её недочеты, игра заставляет тебя вернуться чтобы продолжить в неё играть. Рекомендую поиграть в эту игру и прочувствовать весь спектр предоставляемых ей эмоций.
     В заключение: "I think we did a pretty good job so faaaar!!!!".

Dead by Daylight is a lot of fun if you play it together with people you know. That said, playing alone just isn't fun any more due to the permanent flood of buffs the killers got since the Michael Myers update. Camping might not be that common any more (even though it still may happen some times) but the killers have enough advantages to make up for that. Of the 15 killers in the game you will most likely see mostly 3 specific ones, Michael Myers, the saw pig and the huntress. Of course Michael Myers and the pig are only available an additional purchase. The huntress is (at least currently) one of the free killers. Additionally, to the general killer improvement the developers made sure to make those killers which are only available for money strong enough to suck out the fun in every round you are matched against one of them. Therefore, if you are playing alone I currently can not recommend buying Dead by Daylight.

*EDIT: I fear my review may have been too long to keep some people's attention all the way through as a popular misconception seems to be rising. I'll try and simplify it.

1) A report was filed against me for Griefing. 
2) I contacted Customer Care to see what had happened.
3) I got no answers, no real assistance, and, ultimately, was flat out ignored.
4) I removed the game from my account.

This sequence must be observed. I did not receive a report against me and refuse to acknowledge Behaviour again on that premise. It was the way the CS department handled me that left me with no other choice.


*UPDATE (06/19/2019): For informative purposes, the Ticket I submitted is still OPEN with 8 days of no contact from them. 
*UPDATE (06/28/2019): The Ticket is still OPEN after 17 days with no attempt to give assistance.
*UPDATE (07/04/2019): The Ticket is still OPEN after 23 days with no attempt to give assistance.
*UPDATE (07/04/2019): I have sent another Ticket as a follow up to the last two in hopes of discussing this matter again. The Ticket was picked (by Ian) within FOUR minutes, who moved it into the abandoned one. 
*UPDATE (07/05/2019): It is now 24 hours with no response from BHVR. It seems my Ticket has met the fate of the first two and is being ignored.
*UPDATE (07/08/2019): The first Ticket is OPEN after 27 days, and the second Ticket is OPEN after 4 days, with no attempt to reply on either.
*UPDATE (07/11/2019): Customer Service has responded back to my Follow Up Ticket sent on the 4th. This new agent (Thomas) restated exactly what Ryuti had said a month prior. I responded explaining that I still needed clarification. 
*UPDATE (07/12/2019): Customer Service (Thomas) has responded again! While he did not expand upon the previous statements, he has stated that they cannot "disclose specific details of any incidents leading to [my] ban to protect the identity of any players involved." 
This is, I take it to be, the end of the road. In summary, it took 30 days to inform me "you're banned for reasons we won't explain". Given that BHVR has not displayed any meaningful remorse (aside from Thomas' sudden attentiveness, which I still appreciate) for their mishandling of my issue, I cannot change my recommendation at this time and continue to urge all people considering purchasing their game to exercise caution and seek other games instead.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~


As heartbreaking as this is to do people have to be aware of what could happen to them. The other day I was issued a 24 hour ban for Griefing. I was absolutely stunned when I tried to log in and saw that message. This had to be a mistake. I contacted the Customer Support right away.

It turns out that in one match that I had, though I'm not sure which one exactly, a fellow survivor filed a report against me. The only match that came to mind was one where a Meg player tried to provoke me in post game chat and, failing that, tried to add me as a friend on Steam. I obviously did not accept. Regrettably, whoever handles these reports failed to perform due diligence and investigate properly and, for the first time in all my years of playing any video game, I was actually issued a penalty.

Not that this means much more than words, but I like to think of myself as one of the least toxic, mean-spirited people around. I have never in all my life, in any game, been banned for any reason. I am always very careful to follow the rules of a game most meticulously. I don't even participate in less desirable customs like taunting Killers by doing the weird Butt Dance at the end of matches because I don't want to hurt someone's feelings.

The person who handled my support ticket, Ryuti, barely answered any question I had; instead regurgitating some cookie cutter reply that didn't even seem to specifically apply to the situation I was in. The whole conversation between him and I gave strong feelings of an immense language barrier, like I was trying to communicate with Google Translate. After I tried to clarify his answer, he just stopped responding and the ticket has remained Open with no activity for over 24 hours. 

I eventually filed another ticket, this time as a formal complaint about how I was treated and how my old ticket was abandoned. Exactly THREE minutes later, a second agent (Ian) picked up my ticket (yay!)

...and dumped it right into the old ticket. No reply. No acknowledgement. Nothing.

And that's it. That's the state it is left off in. 

Under no circumstances can I recommend this company be given actual money. I don't even mean that from a "I'm mad and trying to get back at them!" kind of way. This whole situation has completely depressed me, as I have never before actually seen a company disregard a genuine customer before. But in this case, because they are completely whimsical in their processes and negligent in their customer care, giving them real, hard earned money is a gamble. I have, obviously, uninstalled this game, and advise anyone considering purchasing their product to avoid them at all costs. Don't get taken advantage of.
